item.title: Here's why Home Depot remains a buy after retailer clears lowered earnings bar
item.description: We're also reiterating our price target of $440 a share on Home Depot stock.

item.title: We're raising our Coterra Energy price target after a solid quarter, slight outlook tweak
item.description: Capital efficiency was a highlight with output levels above management's outlook range and spending near the low end.

item.title: Home Depot earnings beat Wall Street estimates, as retailer breaks comparable sales losing streak

item.title: Nvidia to report earnings amid infrastructure spending, DeepSeek concerns
item.description: Nvidia reports fourth-quarter financial results on Wednesday after the bell.

item.title: Chegg sues Google for hurting traffic with AI as it considers strategic alternatives
item.description: The online education company has tapped Goldman Sachs as it studies options such as going private or getting acquired.
